title: Drawing, "Harold S. Anderson House: Porch Furniture Layout", December 3, 1937
medium: Graphite and black ink on tracing paper, double ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower right: DONALD DESKEY/630 FIFTH AVENUE/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite in stamp, lower right: 553-6/1/4"-1'-0"/ANDERSON, OLSSON/DEC. 3/37; lower center in graphite: PORCH FURNITURE LAYOUTS - ANDERSON HOUSE. CAL.; dimensions, descriptions, instructions in graphite
description: Floor plans and furniture layout for first and second floor porches. Upper left: second floor porch off two bedrooms with round table and four chairs at upper space; three-seat sofa at center; armchair, ottoman, and table in lower space; floor in masti pave (?). Two sets of screen doors lead to bedrooms. Upper right: floorplan for porch on second floor, off master bedroom; three-seat sofa in upper spac; ottoman and armchair at center; table and two chairs in lower space; floor in masti pave (?). Floor plan at center of first floor porch off guest bedroom. Three-seat sofa and end table at left, chair at center, and armchair, ottoman, and table at right; floor in canvas. Lower right floor plan of first floor porch, off living room. Three-seat sofa, table, and chair in upper space, chair and chaise longue on wheels with end table in lower space. Floor plan at lower center of first floor porch off library; two armchairs with ottomans, chair with ottoman, and chaise longue on wheels.
